item.title: Introduction
item.description: Welcome to Zero To Node! This is a step-by-step guide for setting up a Pocket validator node. While there are many different ways to set up a node, the focus of this tutorial is on keeping things simple and with the minimum of steps, while still focusing on security and stability. This guide is broken down into five parts: Part 1: Server setup Part 2: Software installation Part 3: Pocket configuration Part 4: Proxy configuration Part 5: Going live Background The main utility of a Pocket node is to relay transactions to other blockchains.
